entities.name: bathilda
entities.description: Bathilda is introduced as the owner of the house where Harry stays. She is described as moving close to Harry in the darkness and whispering to him.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is introduced as the main character who has come to Bathilda's house. He uses his wand to light up the room and interacts with Bathilda.

entities.name: horcrux
entities.description: The Horcrux is described as beating fast inside Harry's chest, causing an unpleasant sensation.

relationships.description: Harry interacts with Bathilda in the room, using his wand to light it up and speaking to her.
The Horcrux resides inside Harry's chest, causing him an unpleasant sensation.
